trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events that render the background of objects derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 从导出呈现的对象的背景的事件提供数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs class provides data for the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground> In addition, it provides data for the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawDropDownButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawItemBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawLabelBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawMenuItemBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawOverflowButtonBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawSplitButton%2A>
trans-unit.target: ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs 类为以下事件提供数据:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground>此外，它提供下列方法的数据:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawButtonBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawDropDownButtonBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawItemBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawLabelBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawMenuItemBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawOverflowButtonBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawSplitButton%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawSplitButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawOverflowButtonBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawMenuItemBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawLabelBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawItemBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawDropDownButtonBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawButtonBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs"></xref>类指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>和使用指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the item.
Gets the graphics used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to paint.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is in the overflow area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the ToolStrip property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>处于溢出区域的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，ToolStrip 属性返回一个空字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the owner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
